evidence: Keep one core idea in mind from the physics background-the roles of the X-ray source, the detector, and how a measurement is formed.
Each reading can be interpreted as a line integral of the attenuation coefficient along a straight ray.
With that model in place, we now focus on algorithms that invert those line integrals to recover cross-sectional images.

we’re at the CT Reconstruction milestone. Keep one core idea in mind from the physics background-the roles of the X-ray source, the detector, and how a measurement is formed. Each reading can be interpreted as a line integral of the attenuation coefficient along a straight ray. With that model in place, we now focus on algorithms that invert those line integrals to recover cross-sectional images. If you’d like more depth on the geometry or notation, the companion reading for this module provides it
